constantValues: The layout entity is to provide users a quick way to specify the various different layouts that a single room can be arranged in and the maximum capacity of the room as a result of the change.

definitions.description: The layout entity is to provide users a quick way to specify the various different layouts that a single room can be arranged in and the maximum capacity of the room as a result of the change.
